translations.name: Name
translations.page_participate_text: Participate in updating the Aramean database with valuable data, thus enriching the Aramean heritage.
translations.page_participate_dictionary_text: Add or update Aramaic words in the Aramaic Dictionary
translations.page_participate_places_text: Add or update Aramean places owned by Arameans
translations.page_home_title: Register yourself as an ethnic Aramean
translations.page_home_text: Register yourself to share information with the Aramean Institute and other organizations that serve the Aramean people.
translations.page_home_discover_text: Find people, places, monuments, churches, schools, organizations and much more.
translations.page_register_title: Register yourself as an ethnic Aramean
translations.page_register_text: Share information and enrich the Aramean heritage with us and other organizations that benefit the Aramean people.
translations.page_register_agree_terms: I agree to the terms and conditions.
translations.page_register_agree_iam_aramean: I am Aramean and I acknowledge my Aramean identity.
translations.page_register_agree_database: I would like to be listed as a participant in the public database.
translations.page_register_complete: Your registration will be reviewed within 24 hours.
